mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board_comment ( id, free_num, free_board_comment_number, create_date, free_context_comment, update_date, free_comment_like) VALUES ( #{id}, #{freeNum}, SEQ_FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE,#{freeContextComment},SYSTIMESTAMP, #{freeCommentLike} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT id,free_num,free_board_comment_number, create_date,free_context_comment,update_date, free_comment_like FROM free_board_comment f WHERE free_num = #{freeNum} ORDER BY free_board_comment_number ) a)
